title: Xayah R
body: I was playing a game a few minutes ago and I knew xayah ult could cancel the dmg of zed's ult but I tried that just as the mark was going to explode and it killed me in the air. Is this a bug?

replies.body:
I thought that if you as a {{champion:498}} would be able to cancel {{champion:238}} ult by using{{champion:498}} ult as soon as {{champion:238}} has his death mark on you. Similar to how Zhonyas works against his ult. ({{champion:238}} death mark > Zhonyas = *no zed ult at all*) I may be wrong about {{champion:498}}  ult though but hey, its worth a shot. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
It's not invulnerability, only untargetability. DoTs or delayed damage will still affect you in your ult.
